altername_name: Mario Kart Wii Deluxe Green Edition
name: Mario Kart Wii Deluxe: Green Edition
overview: Mario Kart Wii Deluxe is a modpack created by Fjroyet and the Deluxe team which includes all the official circuits of Super Mario Kart in Mario Kart 7 in their original order.It also includes circuits from other games (Mario Kart 8, Mario Kart Tour, Diddy Kong Racing, Crash Team Racing, F-Zero, Mickey Speedway USA) and personalized fans that the author finds, to date,The best visually, which gives a total of 480 circuits and 10 battle arenas.The game is divided into three editions so that you can choose according to your tastes: - Blue version: Original characters with new vehicles - Red version: Original characters with skins at the Mario Kart Tour - Green version: Custom characters like Sonic, Crash, Kamek or King Bob-Omb The three editions have different music and interfaces depending on their color, but are always consistent with each other and compatible with each other for online (crossplay).There are also different visual changes depending on the edition you use, such as the colors of the minimap, the colors of the miniturbo/drift and the sound effects.
